desc: MagMod's Revolutionary Universal Fit Modifiers Make Flash Photography A Cinch. Be More Creative With Tools That Are Fast, Easy, & Awesome!

layout.text:
We’ve pushed the boundaries of what fast, easy, and awesome looks like.
MagMod 2 modifiers are optimized for round-head flashes, up to 40% lighter, stronger magnetic attachment, and the completely redesigned MagMod Pro Gels are faster than ever!
